participant_1.background:
I love the way my nursery looks with my green crib and crib mobile.
I grow my own vegetables and cook them myself.
my parents are divorced.
I'm more concerned with my health and the health of my children.
I'm grateful to my parents for helping me out financially.

participant_2.background:
I don't have time for pets, but I love tending to my flower beds.
i like to ride motorcycles.
i like to take drives in the country.
I went scuba diving in the Great Barrier Reef, which was an amazing experience.
i take my emotions out through art.

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing this fine afternoon?
Hello, I am doing great, thank you for asking. How about you?
I am doing quite well, thank you for asking. I am glad to hear that you are doing well.
Thank you, I appreciate it.
What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy gardening, riding motorcycles, and taking drives in the country. I also like to go scuba diving.
Scuba diving sounds amazing! I have always wanted to try it but have never had the opportunity.
It is an amazing experience, you should definitely try it sometime.
I definitely will, thanks for the recommendation.
You're welcome.
What else do you enjoy doing?
I also enjoy taking my emotions out through art.
That is interesting, what kind of art do you do?
I paint, draw, and sculpt.
That sounds very creative, I am impressed.
Thank you, I appreciate that.
What are some of your favorite pieces of art that you have created?
I have a few that I am really proud of. I have a painting of a sunset that I did that is really beautiful. I also have a sculpture of a flower that I made that is really detailed.
Those sound amazing, I would love to see them sometime.
I would be happy to show you sometime.
That would be great, thank you.
You're welcome
